references.name: Milena Toporek
references.title: Product Director
references.subtitle: Driving Product Strategy & Growth in Affiliate & Media Publishing
references.testimonial: I really enjoyed working with Jane at Samwise. She is a dependable, thoughtful frontend developer who deeply cares about accessibility, performance, and user experience. Jane collaborated naturally with UX and engineering, took ownership of her work, and always approached problems with a calm, solutions-focused mindset. She was a pleasure to have on the team and someone I'd happily work with again.

references.name: José Ángel Silvera Moreno
references.title: Creative - UI/UX Designer
references.subtitle: Senior to Jane Helen
references.testimonial: Jane is in another level, she consistently delivered a solid work as a developer with a creative UX mindset and a strong will to keep expanding her areas of knowledge. She not only delivers clean, scalable solutions as a dev, but also actively considers usability, accessibility, and the overall user experience in every decision. Jane collaborates seamlessly with design and product teams, she is reliable, detail-oriented, and brings value far beyond her technical role. I highly recommend her for any team looking for a developer who understands the bigger picture.

references.name: Katarzyna Grząka
references.title: UX/UI Designer @ Dear Francis
references.subtitle: Worked on the same team
references.testimonial: Jane is an absolute gem! She has broad knowledge as a front-end developer and UX designer. I've had the pleasure of working with Jane on multiple occasions, and every time she proved that she has a great eye for detail. She is enthusiastic, professional, proactive, and highly collaborative. On top of that, she is one of the most kind-hearted and supportive colleagues you could ask for.

references.name: Ain Tohvri
references.title: CTO
references.subtitle: Managed Jane Helen directly
references.testimonial: Jane grew out of the junior ranks at a strong pace, driven by her positive mindset and progressive attitude. Her attention to detail covered many bases across our multitude of web applications and their interfaces. You could always rely on her delivery, and the entire team came to appreciate her through Pull Requests with detailed context and references—something that will surely be missed!

references.name: Sandra Niciejewska
references.title: Associate Product Manager
references.subtitle: Worked on the same team
references.testimonial: I've had the pleasure of working closely with Jane and she is truly exceptional. She's kind, hardworking and highly skilled in frontend, UX and UI development. Her ambition and eagerness to learn new tools and try new approaches make her stand out. She's always willing to help others and brings a positive, collaborative mindset to every project. I highly recommend her to any team looking for a talented and driven professional!

references.name: Stephanie Buijs
references.title: Front-end Developer at Faraday ✦
references.subtitle: Managed Jane Helen directly
references.testimonial: I had the pleasure of working together with Jane on a Frontend project for one of our clients. Jane is a hard working, fast learning, talented individual and a joy to work with. What impressed me most about Jane is her determination. Whether if it's to get to the root of a bug, creating components or finding ways to improve loading speed, she does not shy away from a challenge. I really enjoyed working together and I know that anyone that will work with her in the future will, too.

references.name: Ana Inés Guagliardi
references.title: Full-stack Web Developer
references.subtitle: Worked on the same team
references.testimonial:
Jane is an amazing and genuinely kind coworker.
She cares deeply about sharing knowledge, always passing along very helpful findings and solutions to the team.
She is very focused on always getting the best result, no matter the size of the task; very committed to bringing good practices to the job.

references.name: Isabella Zimmermann
references.title: Product Designer | B.Sc. User Experience Design
references.subtitle: Studied together
references.testimonial: During my term abroad, I had an opportunity to work on several projects with Jane. On top of an outstanding visual eye, Jane has a solution-oriented, analytical mindset, which enables her to turn her designs into code. I would highly recommend her.

references.name: Alejandro Murcia Ramón
references.title: Senior DevOps Engineer
references.subtitle: Different teams
references.testimonial:
I had the pleasure of working with Jane, and her attention to detail really stands out. She approaches her work in a very thoughtful and meticulous way, always aiming for high-quality results.

Beyond her technical skills, Jane has a strong curiosity and a genuine drive to keep learning, especially in areas beyond her immediate role. This mindset makes her a great collaborator and a valuable team member.

references.name: Elio Elmasilari
references.title: Product Manager at Samwise
references.subtitle: Worked on the same team
references.testimonial:
Working with Jane has been a real highlight. She communicates clearly, stays calm under pressure, and always brings a steady mindset to whatever we're tackling.

We worked through plenty of tricky tickets together, and I always appreciated how she approached debugging with patience and curiosity. She's reliable, thoughtful, and genuinely easy to collaborate with.

references.name: Hellen Sanina
references.title: Frontend Developer at Samwise
references.subtitle: Worked on the same team
references.testimonial:
Working with Jane was an absolute pleasure! She is a talented front-end developer with strong expertise in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, combined with a great eye for web design. Her attention to detail, clean and structured code, and commitment to company standards make her a truly reliable professional.

Jane learns incredibly fast and always strives for excellence whether it's coding, writing documentation, or preparing presentations. She is also one of the most positive and thoughtful people to work with. Open, respectful, and always easy to communicate with, she makes teamwork effortless and enjoyable.

I'm grateful for the time we worked together and have no doubt that any team would be lucky to have her!

references.name: Schalk Venter
references.title: Software Engineering | Interaction Design | Academia and Mentoring | Destigmatizing Mental Illness
references.subtitle: Was Jane Helen's teacher
references.testimonial: Something that really stood out to me in my interactions with Jane is her desire to truly understand the technologies and tools she works with. It is refreshing to see someone approach the world of tech with such a critical eye and a pursuit of knowledge that goes beyond the superficial. Despite still being early in her professional career, she has such a phenomenal work ethic that she is likely to be a massive asset to any team.
